alert.note: Alert for Gogebic; Houghton; Keweenaw; Ontonagon; Southern Houghton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 11:35AM EST until February 23 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST /6 AM CST/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Keweenaw, Ontonagon, Northern Houghton, Gogebic and Southern Houghton Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST /6 AM CST/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snowfall will occur between 3 PM and 10 PM EST this evening. During that period, snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour will be possible at times, making travel especially difficult.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Gogebic; Houghton; Keweenaw; Ontonagon; Southern Houghton
